**Modal verbs:** They are a group of auxiliary verbs that are used to express possibility, obligation, permission, etc.

  The most common modal verbs are:
  
::: {.summary}
  **can - could - may - might - must -  shall - should - will - would.**
:::
  These verbs do not conjugate and do not have infinitives, gerunds, or participles.
